basics.name: Santiago Iván Rodríguez
basics.label: Full Stack Developer focused on building products with extra attention to detail
basics.summary: I am passionate about numbers, technology, and sports. I have successfully led various projects from inception to their mature stage. I primarily work with Typescript, React, Angular, node to create consistent web applications focused on delivering an enjoyable user experience. With over 7 years of experience working both on-site and remotely for companies worldwide, I have collaborated in various environments, from driving startup and entrepreneurial development to contributing to well-established companies. I enjoy attending software and technology development meetings, events, and talks. The best workplace is one that allows me to constantly evolve.

work.name: Publicis groupe
work.summary: Senior Software Developer for e-commerce platform. I am involved in the migration of various products from the American supermarket chain Wegmans Food Markets using NextJs and Storybook as tools for delivering isolated and testable software pieces. I collaborate with fast value delivery for the client, promote good practices, modern, flexible, and optimized architecture, as well as a culture of performance and teamwork.

work.name: Huge
work.summary: As a Senior Software Developer, my main role was to lead and participate in the design, development, and implementation of high-quality user interfaces for the Android Enterprise website ensuring scalability, maintenance, and updates. This involves working closely with designers and development teams to turn interface designs into interactive and engaging experiences for users. Using technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I was responsible for implementing interfaces that are intuitive, responsive, and compatible with a variety of devices and browsers. In addition, I am committed to optimizing interface performance to ensure fast loading times and a smooth user experience.
highlights: Implemented accessibility improvements for visually impaired users on the Android.com page, resulting in a 5% increase in usability.
Contributed to the professional growth of the team by providing technical guidance, conducting code reviews, and fostering a culture of continuous learning.

work.name: Globant
work.summary: My main role as a semi-senior developer involves collaborating in the design, development, and improvement of reusable components and functionalities in web applications. I used Angular, TypeScript, and HTML/CSS to implement dynamic and scalable user interfaces, integrating services with GraphQL and RESTful APIs efficiently. Among my responsibilities included application performance through optimization techniques and the application of unit and integration tests to ensure code quality. This involves working closely with management teams and stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into reusable and effective technical solutions. My focus is on adopting agile methodologies to ensure fast and iterative deliveries, as well as implementing solid software engineering practices to ensure the security, scalability, and long-term maintainability of the developed products.

work.name: Digital Ware
work.summary: I effectively integrated components and functionalities for the implementation of BPM tools (Ophelia BPM) and their different verticals, thus ensuring that all converge into a single technological solution. I used Angular, TypeScript, and HTML/CSS as a stack for the integration of intuitive and easy-to-use web interfaces.

work.name: Grimorum
work.summary: My role as a Full Stack developer involves designing, developing, and implementing technological solutions that allow a business to materialize and express its ideas on intelligent devices that provide solutions to specific problems. This includes working with multidisciplinary teams to understand client needs and turn them into effective technical solutions.

work.name: Impresora Oriental
work.summary: Administrator and developer of a Moodle learning platform for children in early childhood. I used HTML/CSS and Javascript for the integration of games and easy-to-understand interfaces that promote continuous learning. I developed web pages with designs and specific client requirements.

education.institution: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas
Instituto Técnico Industrial Centro Don Bosco
